boost/python/eigen/eigen_to_python.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_EIGEN_TO_PYTHON_HPP_INCLUDED
00002 #define BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_EIGEN_TO_PYTHON_HPP_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include <boost/numpy.hpp>
00005 #include <Eigen/Core>
00006 
00007 namespace boost { namespace python {
00008 
00009 template <typename Matrix>
00010 struct eigen_to_python {
00011     typedef typename Matrix::Scalar Scalar;
00012     typedef Eigen::Matrix<Scalar,Matrix::RowsAtCompileTime,
00013                           Matrix::ColsAtCompileTime,Eigen::RowMajor> TrueMatrix;
00014 
00015     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, shallow_possible = (Matrix::Flags & Eigen::DirectAccessBit));
00016 
00017     static object to_python_shallow(Matrix const & input, object const owner, bool writeable=true) {
00018         if (!shallow_possible) {
00019             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Cannot convert matrix to Python with shared data.");
00020             throw_error_already_set();
00021         }
00022         numpy::dtype dtype = numpy::dtype::get_builtin<Scalar>();
00023         int itemsize = dtype.get_itemsize();
00024         std::vector<Py_intptr_t> shape(2);
00025         shape[0] = input.rows();
00026         shape[1] = input.cols();
00027         std::vector<Py_intptr_t> strides(2, itemsize);
00028         if (Matrix::Flags & Eigen::RowMajorBit) {
00029             strides[0] *= input.stride();
00030         } else {
00031             strides[1] *= input.stride();
00032         }
00033         if (writeable) {
00034             return numpy::matrix(
00035                 numpy::from_data(input.data(), dtype, shape, strides, owner),
00036                 dtype,
00037                 false
00038             );
00039         } else {
00040             return numpy::matrix(
00041                 numpy::from_data(const_cast<Scalar*>(input.data()), dtype, shape, strides, owner), 
00042                 dtype,
00043                 false
00044             );
00045         }
00046     }
00047 
00048     static object to_python_value(Matrix const & input) {
00049         numpy::dtype dtype = numpy::dtype::get_builtin<Scalar>();
00050         numpy::matrix matrix(
00051             numpy::zeros(make_tuple(input.rows(), input.cols()), dtype),
00052             dtype,
00053             false
00054         );
00055         Eigen::Map<TrueMatrix> map(reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(matrix.get_data()), 
00056                                    matrix.shape(0), matrix.shape(1));
00057         map = input;
00058         return matrix;
00059     }
00060 
00061 };
00062 
00063 }} // namespace boost::python
00064 
00065 #endif // !BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_EIGEN_TO_PYTHON_HPP_INCLUDED
